I grew up on a farm.

participant_2.background:
I do not work.
I hate tacos.
I like to swim.
My favorite drink is chocolate milk.
I am bald.

content.text: I grew up on a farm.
I'm not sure I've ever met anyone who grew up on a farm. What was it like?
It was a lot of hard work, but it was also a lot of fun. I loved being outside all the time and getting to work with animals.
That sounds like it was a great experience. I'm not sure I'm cut out for that kind of work, though. I'm more of a city person.
I can understand that. I like being in the city too, but I also love the peace and quiet of the countryside.
I guess I could see how that would be appealing. So, what do you like to do for fun on the weekends?
I like to go out with my friends, go to the movies, or just relax at home. I also like to read and go swimming.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I like to go out with my friends too, but I also like to spend time alone. I like to read, watch movies, and play video games.
I like to read too, but I don't really play video games. I'm not really good at them.
That's okay. I'm not very good at them either, but I still have fun playing them.
I guess I could see how that would be fun. I'm just not sure I have the patience for it.
It's not for everyone. But it's a lot of fun to play with friends.
I can see that. Well, it was nice talking to you.
You too. Have a nice day.
